Package Backend.Facede

Class BackendFacedeSingleton

java.lang.Object
Backend.Facede.BackendFacedeSingleton
All Implemented Interfaces:
I_DataAddFacede, I_DataReadFacede
public class BackendFacedeSingleton extends Object implements I_DataReadFacede, I_DataAddFacede
This class; get inputs from interface, check user inputs, send signals to festival class and contains the list of festivals

    • createFestival

      public int createFestival(@NotNull @NotNull String name, @NotNull @NotNull String place, @NotNull @NotNull String dateFormat, int duration)
      Description copied from interface: I_DataAddFacede
      This method; check inputs, create a festivel object, add festival object to the festival list
      Specified by:
      createFestival in interface I_DataAddFacede
      Parameters:
      name - name of the festival
      place - the place where the festival will be held
      dateFormat - string representation of LocalDate festival start date --- YYYY-MM-DD
      duration - duration of the festival in days
      Returns:
      on failure -1, on success index of last element in the festival list
